Package pl.bristleback.server.bristle.api.annotations

Annotation Types Summary
Action This annotation marks method as action method.
ActionClass Classes marked with this annotation are considered as Bristleback Action Classes.
Bind This annotation can be placed before each action parameter to provide validation.
ClientAction This annotation marks method as client action method.
ClientActionClass Classes marked with this annotation are considered as Bristleback Client Action Classes.
Ignore This annotation should be placed before client action parameters that are not meant to be serialized.
ObjectSender All ConditionObjectSender fields must be marked with this annotation to be properly initialized by Bristleback Server.
Property This annotation describes a single bean property validation.
Serialize This annotation allows to define non default serialization operations, for example, by providing validation.
